readable.title: 416788726_5b4eb1466e
readable.content: A family of five is watching a performer standing on a stepstool . A group of people watch a man standing on a stool dressed in a thong . A half-naked performer is performing for a small crowd outside . A man in a small bathing suit standing on a stool at a tourist location A mostly nude man standing on a stool while a family of 5 look at him questioningly .
